Posts.Content: Wendy ,please have blood work done.my friend just had a similar situation.to check the white blood count.i had early stage breast cancer.
Posts.Title: Underarm lump

Posts.Content: I took my first lupron shot the end of June. So it's about six weeks.I am totally miserable.very bad leg pain,headaches,stomach ache ,and really getting very down I HAD EARLY stage breast cancer, and I had to take this in addition to femara.i stopped femara to identify the source of my symptoms. So while off of that.i realize that lupron is causing such hot flashes .I am soaked day and night .I can't sleep. Help.
Posts.Title: Lupron shot
